item.title: add a network delay in linux
item.description: Adding a delay to all network traffic is pretty easy and can be done through the following command. adding a delay #for device enp0s3 tc qdisc add dev enp0s3 root netem delay 100ms query the current delay #for all devices tc -s qdisc #for device enp0s3 tc qdisc show dev enp0s3 removing the delay tc qdisc del dev enp0s3 root netem
